name: vexo/vexo
description: A PHP library to help you develop applications powered by language models.

suggest.gioni06/gpt3-tokenizer: If you want to use the GPT3 tokeb-based TextSplitter
suggest.google/apiclient: If you want to use the Google* agent tools
suggest.justinrainbow/json-schema: If you want to use JSON output parser
suggest.league/csv: If you want to use the CSV file loader
suggest.league/flysystem: If you want to use the Document file and directory loaders
suggest.openai-php/client: If you want to use the OpenAI language model or embeddings
suggest.php-http/discovery: If you want to use the WebTextChain to fetch web pages
suggest.psr/http-client-implementation: If you want to use the WebTextChain to fetch web pages
suggest.psr/http-factory-implementation: If you want to use the WebTextChain to fetch web pages
suggest.psr/simple-cache: If you want to use the CachingChain to cache chain results
